about_the_game:
A strange wet dream calls you to the city. There are many hot women there to meet. Some are a bit cookie. From there the choice is yours. 

This is a passion project, not just another collection of reused animations where you press a button from time to time. Please consider supporting it if you have the means.

Game features:

-all animations are unique. They are not assets from a store.

-no mandatory relationships. Date only the girls you like

-depth and actual choices. Every girl has at least 2 routes + option for pregnancy. You will need multiple playthroughs to experience all the sex scenes which will be many

-18 main girls + a few secondary ones. Create a harem or chose just one. It is all up to you. Choosing to have sex with one or refusing another can have positive/ negative effects but the point is you always have the option to chose

-end up as a baller with a big mansion filled with chicks and an expensive car, a wagie who ends up getting the girl of his dreams or anything in between

-a few minigames to keep the game interesting and add actual gameplay

-the demo has over 20 sex scenes in this early stage and the full game aims for over 100

-a mysterious main story that takes different playthroughs to unveil fully but can also be completely ignored if your interest lies elsewhere

-the main story has 3 main endings all of which will then branch into 2 different outcomes for the rest of the game depending on your choices

-many fetishes like: harem, marriage, impregnation, cheating, blackmail, hypnosis, sleeping sex, free use, milfs, muscle woman, teacher, goth, tall girls,  short girls and so on. All of them are optional. Chose only the routes you want. Just make sure you are a decent enough person to not get into bad scenarios if you don't want them.

Support us if you can!

content_descriptors.notes: The game graphically depicts different sexual interactions: consensual, sensual, romantic, cheating, hypnosis, emotionless, blackmail, non consensual, multiple partners. All presented in a somewhat jokingly manner. You are not forced to participate in all these situations. The player choses what to do.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 8000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard

name: Sexdew City

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 8000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard

short_description: Much sex, many women, many choice, many routes. Boobs! Solve the dark mysteries in the city or don't. Do whatever, fuck whoever. The game is meant to offer a high degree of freedom and choices that matter.
